title: Candlenut (Kemiri)
subtitle: Premium Indonesian Candlenut for the Global Market
description: At PT. Sudeci Exportir Indonesia, we take pride in offering high-quality Candlenut (Aleurites moluccanus)—commonly known as Kemiri in Indonesia—sourced from the rich, fertile plantations of the archipelago. Widely appreciated for its culinary, cosmetic, and industrial uses, our candlenuts are a testament to Indonesia's rich biodiversity and agricultural heritage.

details.Size&Grade: Export-grade, calibrated based on international standards
details.packaging: Vacuum sealed or PP bags, 10–50 kg
details.shelfLife: Up to 12 months under proper storage

applications.title: Culinary Use
content: A staple in Southeast Asian cuisine as a natural thickener and flavor enhancer
Integral to traditional spice pastes and curries
Used in nut-based sauces, sambals, and marinades

applications.title: Cosmetics & Beauty
content: Extracted oil used in natural hair and skin care products
Known for its moisturizing and anti-inflammatory properties

applications.title: Industrial Uses
content: Used in the production of varnishes, candles, and soaps
As a natural base for organic coating materials

quality: Sorting & Grading: By hand and machine
Low-temperature drying
Free from mold, foreign matter
Phytosanitary, COO, etc.

title: Charcoal Briquettes
subtitle: Sustainable Energy Source from Indonesia’s Natural Resources
description: PT. Sudeci Exportir Indonesia proudly presents high-performance Charcoal Briquettes—a sustainable, eco-friendly fuel solution made from 100% natural materials. Sourced from the finest coconut shells and hardwoods in Indonesia, our briquettes are crafted to deliver long-lasting, smokeless heat for household, commercial, and industrial use.

details.burningTime: Up to 3 hours (varies by shape and usage)
details.packaging: Inner plastic + master box (3 kg / 5 kg / 10 kg / custom)

applications.title: Food Industry
content: Restaurants, hotels, and catering services for BBQ grilling
Exported to countries with strict health standards (EU, Japan, GCC)

applications.title: Household & Camping
content: Clean and easy-to-store fuel option for home use

applications.title: Hookah/Shisha Lounges
content: Long-lasting, low-ash cubes tailored for hookah experiences

applications.title: Industrial Heating
content: Sustainable heat source for small-scale industrial operations

quality: Consistent shape and weight
Moisture and carbon level control
Safe packaging with international compliance
Phytosanitary and Certificate of Origin included upon request

title: Lobster Seedlings
subtitle: Premium Lobster Seedlings for Sustainable Aquaculture Growth
description: PT. Sudeci Exportir Indonesia is proud to offer high-quality Lobster Seedlings (locally known as Benur) sourced from pristine coastal regions of Indonesia. Our seedlings are nurtured under stringent biosecurity and quality protocols to ensure optimal survival rates, rapid growth, and adaptability in global aquaculture systems.

details.speciesOffered: Panulirus ornatus (Ornate Spiny Lobster), Panulirus homarus (Scalloped Spiny Lobster), Panulirus polyphagus (Mud Spiny Lobster)
details.farmingReadiness: Suitable for pond, tank, or cage-based systems
details.packaging: Oxygenated water bag in styrofoam box with temperature control

applications.title: Aquaculture Farms
content: Commercial lobster production for seafood markets
Integrated multi-trophic aquaculture (IMTA) systems

applications.title: Hatchery & Research
content: Breeding programs and biological studies
R&D in sustainable aquaculture

applications.title: Resellers & Distributors
content: Supplying local fishers and growers
Import reselling in coastal countries with growing aquaculture demand

responsibility: We believe that aquaculture is the future of seafood. That’s why our benur lobster production is carried out in compliance with Indonesian fisheries regulations, and our team works closely with licensed hatcheries and coastal cooperatives to promote long-term ecological balance.

logistics.packaging: Live lobster seedlings are packed with oxygen and cooling gel in leak-proof, insulated boxes to maintain optimal conditions.
logistics.exportCompliance: CITES (when applicable), Phytosanitary & Health Certificates, Certificate of Origin (upon request)
logistics.paymentOptions: T/T, LC, DP (flexible on long-term contracts)

title: Banana Leaves
subtitle: PT. Sudeci Exportir Indonesia is a trusted supplier of premium-grade banana leaves, sourced directly from the fertile tropical plantations of Indonesia. With their vibrant green appearance, high durability, and natural fragrance, our banana leaves serve a wide range of industries—from food wrapping and catering to eco-packaging and traditional ceremonies.

details.sizeAvailable: Standard (30x30 cm to 80x100 cm) or Custom Cut

applications.title: Food & Culinary Use
content: Wrapping grilled dishes (e.g., tamales, lemper, pepes)
Presentation trays for restaurants and catering
Traditional Southeast Asian, African, and Latin cuisines

applications.title: Eco-Packaging
content: Organic trays and eco-wrappers for takeaways
Sustainable packaging for tropical-themed brands

applications.title: Religious, Cultural, & Event Use
content: Hindu and Buddhist ceremonies
Wedding decorations and gift wraps
Crafting and creative design materials

sustainability: Banana leaves are a 100% renewable, biodegradable product. By choosing our leaves over plastic and foil, you’re contributing to a greener planet. Our supply chain collaborates with local farmers and cooperatives, ensuring fair trade practices and sustainable harvesting.

logistics.packagingOptions: Folded and layered in poly-lined boxes, Vacuum-sealed (optional for frozen)
logistics.preservationOptions: Fresh chilled with temperature control, Frozen for long-haul shipping
logistics.documentationProvided: Phytosanitary Certificate, Certificate of Origin, Packing List & Invoice

title: Wood Pellet
subtitle: Eco-Friendly Biomass Fuel for Global Energy Needs
description: PT. Sudeci Exportir Indonesia proudly offers premium-grade Wood Pellets—an eco-conscious energy source derived from sustainably managed biomass. Manufactured with strict quality control, our wood pellets ensure high calorific value, low ash content, and consistent performance, making them ideal for industrial heating, power generation, and domestic fuel applications.

applications.title: Industrial Heating
content: Used in boilers and furnaces as a high-efficiency fuel alternative
Reduces carbon footprint for manufacturing plants

applications.title: Power Generation
content: Fuel for biomass power plants and energy conversion systems
Supports renewable energy targets globally

applications.title: Household Use
content: Clean, odorless fuel for pellet stoves and fireplaces
Perfect for winter heating in homes and cottages

quality: Consistent size and density
Low moisture and ash content
Produced under controlled drying and compression process
Free from binders or harmful chemicals

logistics.packaging: Plastic sacks, jumbo bags, or custom per buyer request
logistics.minOrderQuantity: 1 Metric Ton by Sea, 500 Kilograms by Air

advantages: Consistent Quality – Manufactured with strict quality control
Large Production Capacity – Scalable for bulk orders
Competitive Pricing – Flexible terms for long-term partnerships
Reliable Logistics – Timely delivery to global ports

title: Bay Leaf
subtitle: Naturally Grown, Export-Ready Bay Leaves with Rich Aroma
description: PT. Sudeci Exportir Indonesia offers premium Bay Leaves sourced from the fertile tropical regions of East Java, Indonesia. Our bay leaves are handpicked to ensure vibrant color, rich aroma, and clean appearance. Grown naturally without chemical additives, they are safe for culinary and herbal applications — trusted by global food and spice industries.

title: Lime Leaf
subtitle: Fresh Kaffir Lime Leaves with Authentic Citrus Aroma
description: PT. Sudeci Exportir Indonesia supplies premium Lime Leaves harvested from healthy kaffir lime trees in East Java. These leaves are carefully processed to retain their vibrant color, natural oils, and distinct citrus aroma. Grown without chemicals, they are ideal for use in culinary, herbal, and aromatherapy industries worldwide.
